name: One Dimension (k0nsep)
description:
This game is made for the GMTK gamejam 2019 in a timespan of 48 hours.Our team consists of 3 beginners who each did their own part. We used the concept of only one by letting the player  only see  one dimension at a time. By rotating the player, you can rotate this dimension. The goal is to live as long as you can. 

Good Luck!
